statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, purchase_history FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customer_information WHERE purchase_history->'$.total_purchases' > 100;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number, address, purchase_history FROM customer_information WHERE purchase_history->'$.latest_purchase_date' > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date;

SELECT customer_name, contact_number, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 1 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT dealership_name, location FROM dealerships WHERE dealership_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT car_model, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 50000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, car_model, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'NY';
SELECT make, model, year, price FROM vehicles WHERE price > 20000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.street, a.city FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE c.last_name = 'Johnson';
SELECT v.make, v.model, p.purchase_date, p.price FROM vehicles v JOIN purchases p ON v.vehicle_id = p.vehicle_id WHERE p.price > 30000;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.city, p.price FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT brand, model, year, price FROM Cars WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT name, location, contact_person FROM Dealerships WHERE name LIKE 'Best%';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, car_id, dealership_id, purchase_date FROM Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT brand, model, year FROM Cars ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM Dealerships WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, car_id, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
